backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the change-location flow fix to App.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including components, hooks, services, and config.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting the Weather Gizmos page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing place selection and toggling between empty state, search, and weather panel.
frontend/src/components/AdviceBanner.tsx: Weather advice alert component selecting icons and styles based on advice type and conditions.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with header, footer, and gradient background.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Landing screen with logo, hero image, description, and button to start searching for locations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying credits to caffeine.ai, Open‑Meteo, and OpenStreetMap.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing app branding, logo, name, and tagline.
frontend/src/components/LocationSearch.t: Location search UI with input, result list, error handling, and selection callback.
frontend/src/components/WeatherPanel.tsx: Weather display panel with current conditions, advice banner, error/loading states, and change-location action.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentWeather.ts: Fetches current weather data for given coordinates using React Query with caching and retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlaceSearch.ts: Runs a deferred place‑search query against the geocoding service with short caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing; other hooks live in feature-specific files.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports the app name and tagline constants.
frontend/src/lib/weatherAdvice.ts: Generates user-facing advice messages based on weather conditions such as rain, snow, wind, or temperature.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/services/geocoding.ts: Implements place search using Nominatim and maps results into simplified Place objects.
frontend/src/services/weatherApi.ts: Fetches current weather from Open‑Meteo and maps it to the WeatherData structure with condition interpretation.
frontend/src/types/weather.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for Place, WeatherData, and WeatherAdvice.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind, including theme extensions, color variables, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current state, including version info, implemented features, and pending feature requests. Contains detailed entries for backend, frontend, UI, weather logic, storage, build tooling, and known issues.
